name: Bloody Bunny: The Game
overview: “Just move forward and slash ‘em all!” Revenge comes in all shapes and forms – including cute, bunny dolls. Bloody Bunny, The Game is a fast-paced hack-and-slash action title where you play as Bloody Bunny, a vengeful knife-wielding girl who is trapped in the body of a bunny doll. Bloody Bunny awakens in a post-apocalyptic world where humans have been turned into dolls by an evil, nameless organization. While all other dolls have lost their memories and identities, Bloody Bunny awakens with hers and is horrified to realize that her little sister, Mumu, has also been turned into a doll. She sets out to destroy her malevolent creator while killing anyone who gets in her way. Key features: • Two gameplay modes – Story Mode and Endless Mode. • Storyline is based on the popular animated web series, Bloody Bunny: The First Blood by 2Spot Studio. • Third-person action combat and challenging gameplay. • Four different weapons and over 20 skills to unlock. • Seven different worlds with nine boss fights. • Fight through 50 non-stop levels in Endless Mode, a continuous battle arena for only the toughest players.
developers: Digital Innovative Design and Technology Center
